name: Eme-Man
summary: Eme-Man is a Pac-Man game released in 2017 on the Japanese Coca-Cola app; it promotes the Georgia European line of coffee products. Gameplay is almost identical to the original Pac-Man, but the Ghosts are slower, Fruits are coffee products, Power Pellets are coffee beans, Pac-Dots are red, and the maze is a shade of cyan (identical to Pac-Man Plus's maze color).
